description:
Honnouji Academy is a high school led by http://anidb.net/ch56259 [Kiryuuin Satsuki].
Students that can prove their strength are given http://anidb.net/t6174 [Goku Uniforms] made of http://anidb.net/t6169 [life fibres]. These uniforms greatly enhance the wearer`s physical capabilities.
name: Honnouji Gakuen
